General.Name: Traka Resources Ltd
General.Description: Traka Resources Limited engages in the exploration of mineral properties. It primarily holds 100% interest in the Gorge Creek project located in Queensland. The company also has interests in the Musgraves and the Mt Cattlin Gold projects in Western Australia. Traka Resources Limited was incorporated in 2003 and is based in West Perth, Australia.
General.Address: 43 Ventnor Avenue, West Perth, WA, Australia, 6005
